Package org.apache.hcatalog.messaging

Class Summary
AddPartitionMessage The HCat message sent when partition(s) are added to a table.
CreateDatabaseMessage HCat message sent when a Database is created in HCatalog.
CreateTableMessage HCat message sent when a table is created in HCatalog.
DropDatabaseMessage HCat message sent when a Database is dropped from HCatalog.
DropPartitionMessage HCat message sent when a partition is dropped in HCatalog.
DropTableMessage HCat message sent when a Table is dropped in HCatalog.
HCatEventMessage Class representing messages emitted when Metastore operations are done.
MessageDeserializer Interface for converting HCat events from String-form back to HCatEventMessage instances.
MessageFactory Abstract Factory for the construction of HCatalog message instances.
 

Enum Summary
HCatEventMessage.EventType Enumeration of all supported types of Metastore operations.
